TopicTitle: How do I slow down the game clock?

Articles.Content:
I've seen/heard this can be done in several videos I've watched, most notable Scott Manley's videos, as a way to reduce lag during takeoff when the rocket is at it's laggiest. He used some addon or mod to slow the game clock down to 1/4th or 1/8th time and then everything worked, albeit slowly.

Lately I've been trying to build entire large bases and launch them to the stars, but with the lag they generate, there's no way.

Thanks in advance!

In the gameplay settings there's a slider to slow down the clock quite a bit if the game starts lagging a lot, something like max physics delta time... Or something, you'll find it. It's not a mod or plugin but it does work quite well, just horrifically slowly. I just prefer to have the lag.
It was called lagsbane. It's now part of the core game, when the clock turns red or yellow, time is being slowed down
Thanks guys, much appreciated. Now if only I knew how to change "unanswered" to "answered"...
